import React, { Component, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, Form, Input, Radio, Select, TextArea, Header, } from 'semantic-ui-react' import {Message} from '../components/Message' const CreatePubForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [section, setSection] = useState('') const [content, setContent] = useState('') const [thumbnail, setThumbnail] = useState('') const fileInputRef = useRef() function handleFormSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(title) console.log(content) console.log(thumbnail) console.log(section) const formData = new FormData() formData.append('thumbnail') } return(
Create your publication
setSection(e.target.value)} label='Section' control='select'> setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder='Title' /> setContent(e.target.value)} label='Content' placeholder='Publication content ...' /> {thumbnail?:''}
) } export default CreatePubForm
